singularity_effects.name: Temporal Distortion
singularity_effects.description: A phenomenon where time appears to slow down or speed up in the vicinity of a singularity.
observations: Time dilation observed at 10 meters from the singularity.

singularity_effects.name: Gravitational Lensing
singularity_effects.description: The bending of light around a massive object, causing distorted images of background objects.
observations: Light from distant stars appears warped.
Multiple images of the same celestial object observed.

singularity_effects.name: Spacetime Rippling
singularity_effects.description: Fluctuations in spacetime geometry caused by the presence of a singularity.
observations: Increased gravitational waves in the vicinity.

singularity_effects.name: Quantum Fluctuations
singularity_effects.description: Random variations in energy levels and particle states near a singularity.

singularity_effects.name: Event Horizon Phenomena
singularity_effects.description: Effects observed at the boundary of a black hole, including time dilation and extreme gravitational forces.
observations: No information can escape beyond the event horizon.
